channel.title: Posts on John Janes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on John Janes

item.title: Origin Story: The Packard Bell That Started It All
item.description:
It all started in a dark alley.

It was 1992. I was 11. A shadowy figure leaned in and whispered,
“Hey kid… this fell off the back of a truck. You interested in a state-of-the-art Packard Bell?”

No dummies. You didn’t really think that’s how this started, did you?

Gotcha.

Christmas, 1993 — Berwyn, Illinois

The real beginning was Christmas morning, 1993 — at my grandparents’ apartment in Berwyn, Illinois.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello, and welcome to my site.

My name is John Janes, and I’ve been programming in one form or another for most of my life. This blog is a place to share my thoughts on technology and to document what I’ve learned over a 25+ year professional career in software development.

Operating Systems

My daily driver is NixOS, though I regularly work on macOS and Windows as well.
On the server side, Ubuntu is usually my platform of choice.
